alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Logan; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 3:34PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL CHAMPAIGN, LOGAN COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO AND NORTHWESTERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 415 PM EDT... At 334 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Urbana, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Marysville, Bellefontaine, Urbana, Richwood, West Liberty, North Lewisburg, De Graff, Belle Center, West Mansfield, Northwood, Quincy, Rushsylvania, Huntsville, Ridgeway, Woodstock, Valley Hi, Zanesfield, Cable, Raymond and Westville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Residents in these areas should remain alert. If this storm becomes stronger, then a warning may be needed. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central and west central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
